description: This is an example in English.

ess_tms.title: ESS
ess_tms.subtitle: THERMAL MANAGEMENT SYSTEM

item1.name: STABLE SUPPLY OF ENERGY
item1.description: It is essential to stably supply re- newable energy sources with high variability in power generation.
item1.description2: Effective thermal management is required to prevent overheat-ing of electronic components related to batteries.

item2.name: BATTERY LIFE EXTENSION
item2.description: Heat management can extend the life of batteries that are weak to heat.
item2.description2: It improves the overall lifespan and economic feasibility of the energy storage system.

item3.name: INCREASE ENERGY EFFICIENCY
item3.description: Minimizing heat loss through thermal management systems increases energy efficiency.
item3.description2: Increase in the storage of energy.

ess_tms.subtitle2: BENEFIT OF SCS THERMAL MANAGEMENT SYSTEM
ess_tms.subtitle3: ESS(ENERGY STORAGE SYSTEM) + AI THERMAL MANAGEMENT SYSTEM

item4.name: Heat fulid
item4.type: R134a or R1234yf/EG or Iso Oil

battery_tms.title: Electric Bus
battery_tms.subtitle: THERMAL MANAGEMENT SYSTEM

item1.name: Stable Driving
item1.description: Heat generation using a large battery pack
item1.description2: The thermal management sys- tems prevent failures caused by overheating and prevent acci- dents while driving

item2.name: Extending of Battery Life
item2.description2: Thermal management can dou- ble the life of the battery by main- taining the optimum tempera- ture of the battery

item3.name: Improved Stability
item3.description: Overheated batteries are at a high risk of fire
item3.description2: Effective thermal management prevents battery overheating and ensures passenger safety
item3.description3: Improve the reliability of public transportation

battery_tms.subtitle2: Benefit of SCS Thermal Management System
battery_tms.subtitle3: Electric Bus + A.I. Thermal Management System
